original_text: And the priest shall bring them before the Lord and offer his sin offering and his burnt offering,
korean_text: 제사장은 그것들을 여호와 앞에 가져다가 속죄제와 번제를 드리고

sentences.original_text: And the priest shall bring them before the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 제사장은 그것들을 주 앞에 가져올 것이고

sentences.original_text: and offer his sin offering and his burnt offering,
